name: Super Mario Cards
description:
Welcome to Super Mario Cards!

A game based on the famous Super Mario game franchise that mixes Tower Defense with card games. Enter this new adventure in the mushroom kingdom and have fun.

CONTROLLS:

[Mouse (Right Button)]: To see more information.

[Mouse (Left Button)]: To interact.

[Space]: For certain actions.

[Escape]: To Pause Menu.

GAMEPLAY

Help Mario defeat his enemies using cards and other devices, collect more cards and win them all.

Gameplay is quite simple and easy to understand, select new cards at the end of each battle and build a great deck, then use this deck to win battles.

WARNING

As the game is still in development (and early days), many things may be broken or unbalanced. So if you see that it's unfair, try restarting the game or make a comment. I will try to fix everything with future updates!
